entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to zero by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023
